changeSet.author: Tarun, Kiruthiga
changeSet.comment: Adding Concepts for ChemoBaselineAssessment Form

changeSet.author: Tarun, Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_answer ca join concept_name cn on ca.concept_id = cn.concept_id where ca.answer_concept IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name IN ("Normal", "Dyspnoea", "Heart failure", "Cardiac Oedema", "Pulmonary oedema", "Pedal edema", "Cardiomegaly", "Elevated jugular venous pressure", "Valvular abnormalities", "Arrhythmia", "Other") and concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED") AND cn.concept_id IN (select concept_id from concept_name where name = "CBA, Cardiac examination");

changeSet.comment: Adding Answers to CBA, Cardiac examination

changeSet.author: Tarun, Kiruthiga

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from concept_reference_term where code in ("5115","5158","163109","1129","160981","1124","5103","160689","130843","117690","141481","5138","160753","113506","113125","117655") and retired = 0 and concept_source_id = ( select concept_source_id from concept_reference_source where name = "CEIL" and retired =0 );
